con:method.name: createSchoolEnrolments
con:method.con:description:
Bulk operation to create one or more school enrolments as part of the given StudentProviderEnrolment.

Provider enrolments span multiple years with the StudentProviderEnrolment containing one or more ECE, School or Tertiary Enrolment sub-objects for each particular year. Individual per-year school enrolment details are available via this SchoolEnrolment sub-object

Note: StudentProviderEnrolmentRefId and StudentProviderEnrolmentLocalId fields are included in the object to enable bulk CRUD operations to operate across multiple student enrolments within the same provider.

con:parameter.con:name: x-http-method-override
con:parameter.con:description: Rather than CREATE records, treat this request as a SYNC request.

con:parameter.con:name: Accept
con:parameter.con:description: Standard HTTP accept header, choose between JSON and XML for response. Defaults to XML if this header is missing.

con:parameter.con:name: X-Edsby-APIClientId
con:parameter.con:description:
Identifies the client making the API call to network infrastructure allowing WAFs to conduct rate limiting, gather usage statistics, etc. without having to unpack the username, subject claim or API key from the Authorization header.

Must be populated with the subject claim GUID from the access token in the Authorization header.

con:parameter.con:name: X-Edsby-OrganisationRefId
con:parameter.con:description: The Ministry of Education Organisation Id of the Provider(or other Organisation); used to limit the scope of the API endpoint to a particular MoE Organisation.

con:representation.con:description: Create successful; returns created objects
Create successful; returns created objects
Bad request - Request body invalid, Content, Accept, X-Edsby-OrganisationRefId, X-Edsby-APIClientId or other required Headers missing, etc.
Unauthorised - Authorization header missing, or contents incorrect.
Forbidden - API client has successfully authenticated, but is not authorised to make this API call
Not Found - resource in URL not found.
Some objects created, some creates failed
Some objects created, some creates failed

Note: StudentProviderEnrolmentRefId and StudentProviderEnrolmentLocalId fields are included in the object to enable bulk CRUD operations to operate across multiple student enrolments within the same provider.

con:method.name: updateSchoolEnrolments
con:method.con:description:
Bulk operation to update one or more school enrolments with the given StudentProviderEnrolment.

Provider enrolments span multiple years with the ProviderEnrolment containing one or more ECE, School or Tertiary Enrolment sub-objects for each particular year. Individual per-year school enrolment details are available via this SchoolEnrolment sub-object.

Note: StudentProviderEnrolmentRefId and StudentProviderEnrolmentLocalId fields are included in the object to enable bulk CRUD operations to operate across multiple student enrolments within the same provider.

con:parameter.con:name: Accept
con:parameter.con:description: Standard HTTP accept header, choose between JSON and XML for response. Defaults to XML if this header is missing.

con:parameter.con:name: X-Edsby-APIClientId
con:parameter.con:description:
Identifies the client making the API call to network infrastructure allowing WAFs to conduct rate limiting, gather usage statistics, etc. without having to unpack the username, subject claim or API key from the Authorization header.

Must be populated with the subject claim GUID from the access token in the Authorization header.

con:parameter.con:name: X-Edsby-OrganisationRefId
con:parameter.con:description: The Ministry of Education Organisation Id of the Provider(or other Organisation); used to limit the scope of the API endpoint to a particular MoE Organisation.

con:representation.con:description: Update successful; returns updated objects
Update successful; returns updated objects
Bad request - Request body invalid, Content, Accept, X-Edsby-OrganisationRefId, X-Edsby-APIClientId or other required Headers missing, etc.
Unauthorised - Authorization header missing, or contents incorrect.
Forbidden - API client has successfully authenticated, but is not authorised to make this API call
Not Found - resource in URL not found.
Some objects updated, some updates failed

con:method.name: patchSchoolEnrolments
con:method.con:description:
Bulk operation to update one or more fields of one or more school enrolments within the given StudentProviderEnrolment.

Provider enrolments span multiple years with the ProviderEnrolment containing one or more ECE, School or Tertiary Enrolment sub-objects for each particular year. Individual per-year school enrolment details are available via this SchoolEnrolment sub-object

Note: StudentProviderEnrolmentRefId and StudentProviderEnrolmentLocalId fields are included in the object to enable bulk CRUD operations to operate across multiple student enrolments within the same provider.

Identifies the client making the API call to network infrastructure allowing WAFs to conduct rate limiting, gather usage statistics, etc. without having to unpack the username, subject claim or API key from the Authorization header.

Must be populated with the subject claim GUID from the access token in the Authorization header.

con:parameter.con:name: X-Edsby-OrganisationRefId
con:parameter.con:description: The Ministry of Education Organisation Id of the Provider(or other Organisation); used to limit the scope of the API endpoint to a particular MoE Organisation.
